Experiment Method.Assay Method: Quenched hydrogen/deuterium exchange coupled to NMR spectroscopy

Material used.Description: Analysis of wild-type and A30P mutant a-synuclein fibrils

Readout description.Molecular Effect: No structural alteration in beta-strand topology
Readout description.Result Description: The A30P mutation does not alter the number, location, or arrangement of beta-strands in a-synuclein fibrils. However, some residues exhibit nano-second dynamics.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the abstract

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the abstract

Basic positive control.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the abstract

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the abstract

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: No structural differences in beta-strand arrangement
